nested_items.description: The resource name of an Amazon Connect campaign.

nested_items.description: The name of an Amazon Connect Campaign name.

nested_items.description: Amazon Connect Instance Id.

nested_items.description: Predictive Dialer config.

nested_items.name: bandwidthAllocation

nested_items.name: dialingCapacity
nested_items.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

nested_items.description: Agentless Dialer config.

nested_items.name: dialingCapacity
nested_items.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

nested_items.name: outboundCallConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration used for outbound calls.

nested_items.name: connectContactFlowId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the contact flow for the outbound call.

nested_items.name: connectSourcePhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number associated with the Amazon Connect instance, in E.164 format. If you do not specify a source phone number, you must specify a queue.

nested_items.name: connectQueueId
nested_items.description: The queue for the call. If you specify a queue, the phone displayed for caller ID is the phone number specified in the queue. If you do not specify a queue, the queue defined in the contact flow is used. If you do not specify a queue, you must specify a source phone number.

nested_items.name: answerMachineDetectionConfig
nested_items.description: Answering Machine Detection config.

nested_items.name: enableAnswerMachineDetection
nested_items.description: Enable or disable answering machine detection.

nested_items.name: awaitAnswerMachinePrompt
nested_items.description: Enable or disable await answer machine prompt.
